discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click: Sɛ wo mia "$1" so a, wagye mmra a ɛfa wiki wei so nyinaa atumu
discussiontools-replywidget-transcluded: Yɛ bɛ kora wo mmuae no wɔ
tag-discussiontools-description: Wɔ de nkɔmmɔdie akade na yɛɛ nsakyerae
tag-discussiontools-edit-description: Dwumadifoɔ de nkɔmmɔdie akade sesaa mmuae a ɛwɔ hɔ dada
tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: Dwumadifoɔ yi nnam nkɔmmɔdie akade de nyinasos3m foforɔ kaa ɔfa yi ho
tag-discussiontools-reply-description: Dwumadifoɔ no de nkɔmmɔdie akade yii asɛmbisa bi ano
tag-discussiontools-source-description: Na nkɔmmɔdie akade wɔ bea a ne ti firi
tag-discussiontools-visual-description: Akadeɛ a wo betumi de adi nkɔmmɔ no yɛ neɛ wo de w'ani hunu
